subject: Football
Tests (Drug Use)
lead_paragraph: Any progress on issues facing the N.F.L. — like H.G.H. testing — will have to overcome what appears to be a lack of trust between the players and the league.
snippet: Any progress on issues facing the N.F.L. — like H.G.H. testing — will have to overcome what appears to be a lack of trust between the players and the league.
